original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma

original: 20.5. Mahantaraduka
analyzed: mahantaraduka

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sārammaṇaḥ ca anārammaṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sārammaṇam ca na anārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na cittam dhammam paṭicca cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na cittam dhammam paṭicca

original: nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca
analyzed: no cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na cittam dhammam paṭicca citto ca no citto ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na no cittam dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na cittam ca na no cittam ca dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na cetasikam dhamma

original: paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko
analyzed: paṭicca acetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca cetasikaḥ

original: ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta sampayutto ca citta vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca citta sampayutto ca citta vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam ca na citta vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na citta sasaṭṭha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca citta visasaṭṭhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na citta sasaṭṭha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca citta sasaṭṭho ca citta visasaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānaḥ ca no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṁ
analyzed: na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na citta sahabhu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca no citta sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na citta sahabhum dhamma

original: paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca citta sahabhū ca no citta sahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca citta anuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca no citta anuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā
analyzed: na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca citta anuparivattī ca no citta anuparivattī ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum dhammam paṭicca citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na bāhiram dhammam paṭicca bāhiraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naajjhattikañca nabāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ajjhattikam ca na bāhiram ca dhammam paṭicca ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe pañca pe avigate nava

original: Naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādā dhammam paṭicca upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca
